mapper.select: select news_no as newsNo, member_no as memberNo, org_no as orgNo, news_name as newsName, news_content as newsContent, news_thumb as newsThumbPath, news_date as newsDate, read_count as readCount from( select rownum as rnum, a.* from ( select * from tbl_news order by news_date desc )a )a where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

SELECT n.news_no AS newsNo, n.member_no AS memberNo, n.org_no AS orgNo, n.news_name AS newsName, n.news_content AS newsContent, n.news_thumb AS newsThumbPath, n.news_date AS newsDate, n.read_count AS readCount, m.member_name AS memberName, o.org_name AS orgName FROM tbl_news n JOIN tbl_member m ON n.member_no = m.member_no JOIN tbl_org o ON n.org_no = o.org_no WHERE n.news_no = #{_parameter}
